actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Indian Affairs.
Committee on Indian Affairs. Hearings held.
Committee on Indian Affairs. Ordered to be reported with an amendment in the nature of a substitute favorably.
Committee on Indian Affairs. Reported to Senate by Senator Inouye under the authority of the order of Aug 2, 90 with an amendment in the nature of a substitute. With written report No. 101-431.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 786.
Passed Senate with an amendment by Voice Vote.
Message on Senate action sent to the House.

actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to provide for Federal recognition of the Jena Band of Choctaws of Louisiana, and for other purposes.
short_title: Jena Band of Choctaw Recognition Act

summary.text: Jena Band of Choctaw Recognition Act - Extends Federal recognition and associated services and benefits to the Jena Band of Choctaw of Louisiana. Directs that the Tribe be governed by an Interim Council until the Secretary of the Interior conducts elections to adopt a constitution for the Tribe and to elect tribal officials.

titles.title: Jena Band of Choctaws Recognition Act
